Homepage_Analysis_Results.name: Homepage_Analysis_Results
observations: Current structure: MONOLITHIC - all sections in single index.njk file (8,530 bytes)
No component separation - all 6 homepage sections inline
Sections identified: Hero, Services Preview, Why Choose ICA, Testimonials, Recent Posts, CTA
Template system: Basic 11ty with base.njk layout and content injection
No modular components - everything hardcoded in main file
Recommendation: Implement component-based architecture for maintainability
Components needed: 6 separate section files for easier management
Benefits: Better organization, reusability, easier updates, team collaboration
